boardgame.name: Crisis
boardgame.description: Axia _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; a land with a glorious past, a most uncertain present, and an even more unpredictable future. Populated by what has been described as a fervent and warm-blooded people, Axia is in crisis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; economic, social, and political: the longest-running recession in its modern history, the highest inequality in years, and a political system teetering on the brink of collapse._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In more ways than one, Axia is fighting against itself. Old divisions of the past have given way to new ones, and this generation _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; along with the next ones _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; has the most to lose._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Will you, along with your fellow industrialists, do your part to help Axia? Will you sacrifice short-term gain in the present for a brighter future? Can you do that, and survive? Perhaps you can, and perhaps you can even thrive _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and you will, if you see opportunity where others only see crisis!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;CRISIS is a turn-based game for 1-5 players who assume the roles of businessmen, trying to rebuild their businesses and create value at a particularly challenging time. By skillfully placing their managers in a position to invest in companies, trade resources, and navigate the local bureaucracy and regulations, they can thrive and prosper in a time when others might struggle and decline._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

If anyone is looking for a very nice copy of Crisis, well this is it! My copy is very close to mint (played once). Everything is in top condition. Shipping to the US is usually 22-25$ depending on your location, or, if you are willing to wait a bit, I do go to the US regularly and could ship this Flat Rate. Shipping to Canada is between 12$ and 17$ depending on how far west you are. Shipping worldwide is possible, but extremely expensive. Local pickup is also possible in Montreal (Quebec). And last thing, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m open to trades, but chances are I will ask a higher value in trade than cash (I definitely prefer cash).
